security: Information concerns individuals connected to Air Force cover, USIA, and CIA activities. Disclosing names and relationships could potentially compromise past operations and individuals involved.
summary: A memo containing notes on Daniel A. Parsons' career, including his Air Force cover, relationships with various organizations (USIA, CIA), and individuals connected to him; the memo also contains information about indexing and file management.
summary_one_paragraph: This memo, dated May 12, 1978, contains notes regarding Daniel A. Parsons' career from 1958 to 1974, covering his Air Force cover, relationship with USIA and the CIA, and assignments in Moscow, Vienna, and London. It mentions individuals such as John Sager, Paul Garbler, and others connected to Parsons and notes about CIA personnel when Parsons left Moscow. The memo concludes with information about indexing and file management systems.
title: Daniel A. Parsons Career Notes
